title: Building a Static Portfolio Site
excerpt: Why I chose vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript over frameworks for my personal portfolio. A brief exploration of simplicity and performance in web development.

title: Learning Through Building
excerpt: Reflections on how building projects has shaped my understanding of software engineering. The difference between knowing concepts and applying them in practice.

title: Thoughts on Minimal Design
excerpt: Why less is often more in web design. Exploring the principles of minimalism and how they apply to creating effective user experiences.
